channel.title: Rodriguez, Javier on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Rodriguez, Javier on Chege's Blog

item.title: The Dreaming: Waking Hours
item.description: A spin-off from Gaiman’s Sandman , featuring the reincarnated Lord Dream. Notable Plot Points [Morris] Professor Dunbar… The reason I asked you to be my advisor is because I thought you of all people would understand what it’s like to be a woman in academia. [Professor Dunbar] You mean you thought I’d cut you a break. But I never got a break. I was the only woman in my class at Oxford who left with a PhD, and for my trouble, I’m teaching at a no-name university in New Jersey.
